analysis.description:
Contract locking ether found in /unique_chucks/15/0xf8857772f893cfa85a6da85e79d8946716d7992e.sol:
	Contract ZcnoxToken has payable functions:
	 - fallback (/unique_chucks/15/0xf8857772f893cfa85a6da85e79d8946716d7992e.sol#268-269)
	But does not have a function to withdraw the ether

ZcnoxToken.bounty should be constant (/unique_chucks/15/0xf8857772f893cfa85a6da85e79d8946716d7992e.sol#124-125)
ZcnoxToken.company should be constant (/unique_chucks/15/0xf8857772f893cfa85a6da85e79d8946716d7992e.sol#116-118)
ZcnoxToken.crowdsale should be constant (/unique_chucks/15/0xf8857772f893cfa85a6da85e79d8946716d7992e.sol#119-123)
ZcnoxToken.team should be constant (/unique_chucks/15/0xf8857772f893cfa85a6da85e79d8946716d7992e.sol#118-119)

Detected issues with version pragma in /unique_chucks/15/0xf8857772f893cfa85a6da85e79d8946716d7992e.sol:
	- pragma solidity^0.4.18 (/unique_chucks/15/0xf8857772f893cfa85a6da85e79d8946716d7992e.sol#1): it allows old versions
Parameter '_newOwner' of Owned.transferOwnership (/unique_chucks/15/0xf8857772f893cfa85a6da85e79d8946716d7992e.sol#90) is not in mixedCase
Parameter '_address' of ZcnoxToken.distributeToken (/unique_chucks/15/0xf8857772f893cfa85a6da85e79d8946716d7992e.sol#149-152) is not in mixedCase
Parameter '_amount' of ZcnoxToken.distributeToken (/unique_chucks/15/0xf8857772f893cfa85a6da85e79d8946716d7992e.sol#153) is not in mixedCase
Parameter '_from' of ZcnoxToken.checkPermissions (/unique_chucks/15/0xf8857772f893cfa85a6da85e79d8946716d7992e.sol#157) is not in mixedCase
